name: NekoSoup_TranSphere
description:
A small brick game made for Epic's Spring UE4 Jam 2018. Theme was "Transform". Team of 3 people, developpement started late.

Team : Neko Soup Games

How to Play :
- Use the mouse's cursor to move the pads (the pads follow the mouse's cursor).
- Use the WASD keyboard's keys to change the Pinball's Element.
- Hit the Bricks with the matching Element to break them and score points.
- Hittings the outer walls will remove points.

All Materials created in Substance.
Substance Textures :
- Molten Lava (Textures.com)
- Frozen Lake (Textures.com)
- Granite Cliff (Textures.com)
- Stylized Mud 2 (Textures.com)
- Cliff Top (Textures.com)

All sounds from previous personnal projects and from Sonniss GDC files.
Music : Clear Text by Rémi GALLEGO (from HACKNET Original Soundtracks).
